name: @seneca/repl
description: Provides a client and server REPL for Seneca microservice systems.
author: Richard Rodger (https://github.com/rjrodger)

scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build && npm test
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish: npm run clean && npm i --registry=http://registry.npmjs.org && npm run repo-publish-quick
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --access public --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org
